Profile
Molecular biology graduate turned data scientist, driven by curiosity and innovation. Skilled in 
Python and SQL, and familiar with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch. I 
bridge science and data to develop solutions that drive progress and innovation.

Montréal, Canada

Publications
MTALTCO1: a 259 amino-acid long mtDNA-encoded alternative 
protein that challenges conventional understandings of mitochondrial 
genomics
•Here we report the discovery and functional characterization of 
MTALTCO1, the longest human mitochondrial alternative protein to 
date, revealing its expression, mitochondrial translation, interactions, 
and evolutionary conservation.27/06/2025
